mapper.select: SELECT GROUP_NO, GROUP_NAME, MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NAME, EMPNO FROM TB_BIZGROUP JOIN TB_MEMBER USING (MEMBER_NO) WHERE GROUP_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY GROUP_NO DESC

SELECT B.ADDRESS_NO, B.NAME, B.BIZ_NAME, B.POSITION, B.EMAIL, B.PHONE, B.STATUS, B.GROUP_NO, B.MEMBER_NO, CASE WHEN B.ADDRESS_NO IN (SELECT ADDRESS_NO FROM TB_BIZADDRESSFAV WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END BOOKMARK, G.GROUP_NAME FROM TB_BIZADDRESS B JOIN TB_BIZGROUP G ON (B.GROUP_NO = G.GROUP_NO) WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY B.ADDRESS_NO DESC

SELECT B.ADDRESS_NO, B.NAME, B.BIZ_NAME, B.POSITION, B.EMAIL, B.PHONE, B.STATUS, B.GROUP_NO, B.MEMBER_NO, CASE WHEN B.ADDRESS_NO IN (SELECT ADDRESS_NO FROM TB_BIZADDRESSFAV WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END BOOKMARK, G.GROUP_NAME FROM TB_BIZADDRESS B JOIN TB_BIZGROUP G ON (B.GROUP_NO = G.GROUP_NO) WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND B.GROUP_NO = #{groupNo} ORDER BY B.ADDRESS_NO DESC
